title: 022 - Pick 3 Debates
description: On today's show the guys spend the entire episode in Digs Debates, as they take all the different "you can only keep 3" memes going around and give their opinions as they cover, movies, snacks, candy, comedians, you name it. The guys also check in on Tony as he gets ready for the upcoming 48 miles that he has staring him down come Thursday. It's a fun one. Stay safe out there, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
